title.rendered: Signature Global City 93: A Gem of Independent Premium Floors in the heart of New Gurugram

content.rendered:
Nestled far from the hustle and bustle of the city, this is Signature Global City 93. A project rendered with the serenity of nature and contemporary construction style spreads across a vast land parcel to give the dwellers the best living experience. This is a gated community that is being developed on the norms prescribed under the Deen Dayal Jan Awas Yojna (DDJAY). According to this policy, we promote low rise premium independent floors. The unit types available here comprise of 2 & 3 BHK units.



The project, along with these enriching specifications, has been designed excellently to ensure maximum visibility and natural sunlight for each floor. Apart from this, the project also provides amazingly planned features and amenities that would ease the life of residents. The list includes a clubhouse, electric car charging stations, reflexology path, e-library, meeting room, yoga court, skating rink, open gym, badminton court, wellness zone, etc. This  Signature Global’s premium floors in Gurugram also offer modular kitchens, co-working space, a virtual concierge app and many more affluent features.



CONNECTIVITY:

  • Well Connected to NH-48.
  • Dwarka Expressway.
  • CPR
  • SPR(Southern Peripheral Road Gurgaon Manesar)


RECREATIONAL/HOTELS IN 7 KM RADIUS:

  • Holiday Inn
  • ITC Grand Bharat
  • Radisson Hotel
  • Hyatt Regency

MULTI-SPECIALTY HOSPITAL IN 6KM RADIUS:

  • Medanta Medicity
  • Aarvy Healthcare
  • Miracles Apollo Cradle/Spectra Hospital
  • Genesis Hospital
  • Arc Multi Specialty Hospital
  • Rockland Hospital
  • Greenway Hospital
  • ESIC Hospital, Manesar
  • Silver Streak Hospital
  • Medeor Hospital, Manesar

MAJOR SCHOOL IN 6KM RADIUS:

  • DPS
  • RPS International
  • St. Xavier’s.
  • Yaduvanshi School
  • Maitrikiran School
  • Euro Kids School
  • Ipsaa Day Care and Pre School
  • Kidzee School
  • Shri chaitanya School


The Signature Global City 93 is an Edge Certified project that offers Green Homes. This means that the construction of the project involves non-toxic and nature-friendly materials. The building design adapts to the neighboring nature. The surrounding region also possesses vast open and verdant spaces. These premium floors in Gurugram are designed by Padma Bhushan Architect Hafeez Contractor. The interior designing part is catered by the internationally renowned interior designer Sonali Bhagwati. The project, therefore, is going to be a work of perfection amidst an urban location.
